page.title: 15A Day in the Life of Gavin.
page.content: In the morning I wake up about 7.30,get out of bed and go to the bathroom to wash and brush my teeth. Then I turn on the{television}to watch Breakfast T.V.This is a programme in which people talk about the news,pop songs,films and the weather.I eat some {Cornflakes}for breakfast and get to school about 8.55a.m. In our school we are taught lessons such as{Mathematics,English,History, Geography,Science,German,Wood or metal work,Art and Computer Studies. At 12 noon we have a break for lunch .I usually eat{chips.}I leave school at 3.35p.m. At home I do my homework and eat my dinner before watching T.V.or playing with my{Sinclair}computer.If the weather is fine I may go out to play {football}or ride my bike. I go to bed about 10p.m.
